How many people are affected by renal coloboma syndrome ?,The prevalence of renal coloboma syndrome is unknown; at least 60 cases have been reported in the scientific literature.,GHR,renal coloboma syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to renal coloboma syndrome ?,"Renal coloboma syndrome is caused by mutations in the PAX2 gene. The PAX2 gene provides instructions for making a protein that is involved in the early development o
